title: Gamification-Based Elementary Science Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic scientific concepts and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Training for pre-service elementary teachers to apply gamification techniques in science classes, emphasizing learner engagement through parallel use of digital tools and offline activities

learning_goals: Learners can apply core gamification mechanisms (e.g., experience points, badges, leaderboards) to science lesson design
Learners can create interactive science learning content using digital tools (e.g., Kahoot, Quizizz)
Learners can analyze the impact of gamification on learning motivation through project-based assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
